creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black shirt with multicolored embroidery and white beadwork; embroidered designs include geometric patterns and small human figures; neck opening consists of vertical slit; embroidery predominantly located in lower portion of shirt and is made up of pink, yellow, and green colors; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides; four white plastic buttons found on bottom edge at center
title: Man's ceremonial shirt
